column2: "I was just talking to Sir Kotoshiro, and uh... I'm still not sure it's safe for their people to be fighting Darkers."
"...We spoke of this previously. I do not understand your concern... why do you insist we not engage them?"
"Well, without the power of Photons, you can't erase the Darkers... and their residue accumulates, corrupting life."
"You've seen it too, right? It's how [Double] manages to control the Kuronians."
"Then how do you explain that our warriors have waged countless battles, and yet none have shown symptoms of which you speak?"
"Hrm. If you are correct, then this is quite unusual."
"Kotoshiro, art you a fool? 'Tis plain as day."
"All life on this planet 'tis under its blessing. Malice of that sort is easily repelled."
"But Sukuna-hime, that fails to explain why the Kuronians have turned berserk."
"Ay... forsooth, the Kuronians shouldst be bless'ed much the same as us... Hm."
"Those wicked twins! It hath to be them."
"If by cunning they deciev'd the Kuronians into believing they were alike mineself, t'would be easy to incite war."
"Nevertheless, this concerns you not. 'Tis our responsibility to protect our own."
"Quite besides, those giants deserve a hardy thrashing. Their arrogance is as monst'rous as their build."
